original_text: Then the town's leaders must call the man to come to them. They must talk to him. Perhaps he will continue to say, ‘I do not want to marry her!’
korean_text: 그 성읍 장로들은 그를 불러다가 말할 것이며 그가 이미 정한 뜻대로 말하기를 내가 그 여자를 맞이하기를 즐겨하지 아니하노라 하면

sentences.original_text: must call the man to come to them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 남자를 불러 자기들에게 오게 해야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: Perhaps he will continue to say
'I do not want to marry her!'
